briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy Study of Several Replagal Dosing Regimens on Cardiac Function in Adults With Fabry Disease
officialTitle: A Multi-Center, Open-Label, Randomized Study Evaluating the Safety and Efficacy of Three Dosing Regimens of Replagal Enzyme Replacement Therapy in Adult Patients With Fabry Disease

arms.label: Replagal 0.2 mg/kg, IV, every other week

summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the safety and effectiveness of various doses of Replagal in patients with cardiomyopathy due to Fabry disease.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline to Month 12 in Left Ventricular Mass Indexed to Height (LVMI)

effectByArm.arm: Replagal 0.2 mg/kg, IV, Every Other Week
